title: LOL Persona
description: A web application that analyzes League of Legends gameplay style to identify individual tendencies and characteristics. It analyzes user play patterns through game data and provides personalized reports.
shortDescription: Gameplay style analysis and personality assessment service

title: Name to Korean
description: A service that naturally converts foreign names to Korean. It provides accurate Hangul notation based on pronunciation rules and Korean notation standards, supporting names from various language regions.
shortDescription: Foreign name to Korean conversion service

title: Prank Shot
description: A web application for creating and sharing fun prank photos. You can create content to enjoy with friends using various filters and effects.
shortDescription: Prank photo creation and sharing platform

title: Bald Clicker
description: A mobile clicker game where players tap to hit bald heads for instant satisfaction and stress relief. Features a collection system where players unlock new bald head styles by reaching hit milestones, with each bald head having unique visual designs. Includes fever time mode activated through rewarded video ads, providing 3 minutes of double counting with enhanced visual effects. Built with Flutter for smooth 60 FPS gameplay, targeting teens who enjoy quick, rewarding mobile games with collection elements.
shortDescription: Addictive bald head tapping clicker game with collection system

title: ToonPrompt
description: Convert photos to animation styles! A web application that transforms regular photos into various animated styles including Ghibli, Simpsons, and Disney styles. Get optimized prompts for ChatGPT image generation with 1:1 ratio support.
shortDescription: Photo to animation style conversion service

title: K-Pop Demon Hunters
description: A web-based action game where players hunt demons using K-Pop themed weapons and characters. Features dynamic combat system with music-synced gameplay elements.
shortDescription: K-Pop themed demon hunting action game

title: 할인도우미 (Discount Helper)
description: 편의점과 카페에서 최적의 할인 방법을 찾아주는 실용적인 웹 애플리케이션입니다. 복잡한 편의점/카페 할인 혜택들(통신사 멤버십, 카드사 할인, 간편결제 등)을 실시간으로 비교 분석하여 사용자에게 최적의 할인 조합을 제안합니다. Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript 5를 활용한 최신 기술 스택으로 구현되었으며, 클라이언트 사이드 계산으로 서버 비용을 최소화했습니다.

title: 넌센스 AI 그림퀴즈
description: Midjourney AI를 사용하여 고품질의 퀴즈 이미지를 생성한 그림 퀴즈 게임입니다. 기존의 넌센스 퀴즈 게임들이 가진 낮은 품질의 그림 문제를 개선하고자, 그림 생성 AI(Midjourney)를 활용하여 시각적으로 뛰어난 퀴즈 이미지를 제작했습니다. 이를 통해 사용자들에게 더 높은 몰입감과 재미를 선사하는 것을 목표로 합니다.
shortDescription: AI를 활용한 고품질 그림 퀴즈 게임

title: 컵라면 초성 퀴즈 앱
description: React Native와 Expo를 사용하여 개발한 컵라면 초성 퀴즈 애플리케이션입니다.
